text: Jennifer Lesley Ellison (born 30 May 1983) is an English actress, model, television personality, dancer and singer. Ellison was born in Liverpool. She played Emily Shadwick in the television soap opera Brookside. In The Phantom of the Opera movie adaptation, she played Meg Giry. She was a contestant in the 2012 series of Dancing on Ice. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Liverpool Category:Dancing on Ice participants Category:English movie actors Category:English pop musicians Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Singers from Liverpool Category:1983 births Category:Living people
title: Jennifer Ellison
